author: sky.cactus
content: I think an actual state rent (where you *pay* to keep storage live) is ideal from an economic standpoint.  For pricing I do like harberger tax, though that could become complicated from an implementation standpoint.

author: sky.cactus
content: Also, *switching* to a state rent model for an already operational chain is hard.

author: sky.cactus
content: I tend to agree that just *staking* to retain state is not economically aligned.
